topics.body:
I was thinking about how hard it would be to do a Monster Hunter cosplay, just because of how detailed the armor is

Then I realized I could just cosplay the no armor form and just make a cool sword

And dress my cat up as my hunting partner
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f8faec636872178e780100#post_54f8faec636872178e780100
If I ever get into a financially applicable situation, I'm gonna get a pet fox.
And name him Frank Jaeger.

~^[spoiler]Five internet points to the first one to get that reference.[/spoiler]^~
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f8fba363687276579e0700#post_54f8fba363687276579e0700
I never get any references.
You know...
ANYTHING could be a reference, right? And we don't even know it.
topics.author: 5446fcfc6368723ec21a0000

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f8fc49636872176fb60a00#post_54f8fc49636872176fb60a00
It's a Metal Gear reference.
[spoiler]After ol' Franky boy got punked during Metal Gear, someone decided to stick him in a nanosuit to keep him alive. He then took up the moniker "Grey Fox" and helped Snake take down REX.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body: So I just had a dream I was in the DBZ universe and was fighting along side Vegeta And Goku against some powerful Aliens and Vegeta went super saiyan and shot some of his Super Ki energy into me and then I used that energy to do a move called the "Ghost Cannon" and Blew up half a chunk of the planet off the map.
